intro: Exacum heteroclitum, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to Africa. It belongs to the family Primulaceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. Exacum heteroclitum is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
